verb.comment: EGYPTIAN ARABIC Framefile based on qaD~aY-v

example.parse: (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MP كانوا) (VP (IV3MP+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:MP_MOOD:I يقضون) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC عقوبة) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN السجن))) (NP-TMP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC لحظة) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN تجنيس) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MP هم))))))))))))))

frameset.comment: Based on roleset qaDaY-i.05 Based on roleset qaD~aY-v.05
